name: OnrampInvest
0:
”Alexa, ask Onramp Invest to tell me about the company”
”Alexa, ask Onramp Invest to tell me about bitcoin”
”Alexa, ask Onramp Invest to play the latest update”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: on ramp invest
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Onramp Invest is the world’s most advanced digital asset wealth platform for forward-thinking financial professionals. Onramp brings together everything an advisor needs to offer safe, smart, and seamless cryptocurrency investments for their clients. And Onramp Academy offers a vast library of crypto education, research and thought leadership absolutely free. 

Onramp’s goal is to keep financial professionals ahead of the crypto curve and help them unlock the future of digital asset wealth management.

Enable this skill then say, "Alexa, ask Onramp Invest to play the latest update."
When you are notified that there's an update, use this phase to hear it.

Updates about:
-New digital asset developments
-Bitcoin, ethereum and other top cryptocurrencies
-The Onramp Invest platform
-The Node Ahead Blog
-Onramp Academy
-Hot Tips for Financial Advisors
-Frequently asked questions by financial advisors like you

For the main menu, say: "Alexa, open Onramp Invest".

One-shot phrases to open the Skill and jump to specific content:

Alexa, ask Onramp Invest to tell me about Eric Ervin.
Alexa, ask Onramp Invest to tell me about the CEO.
Alexa, ask Onramp Invest to tell me about Brett Munster.
Alexa, ask Onramp Invest to tell me about the Director of Research.
Alexa, ask Onramp Invest to tell me about what's new.
Alexa, ask Onramp Invest to tell me about the product roadmap.
Alexa, ask Onramp Invest to tell me about Bitcoin.
Alexa, ask Onramp Invest to tell me about BTC.
Alexa, ask Onramp Invest to launch Onramp Academy.
Alexa, ask Onramp Invest to tell me about crypto education.

Learn more: onrampinvest.com
Follow us: @onrampinvest

Want to manage your hands-free homepage and updates on Alexa? Request a demo at wealthvoice.ai.
